title: Milwaukee Group Teaches Protesters Civil Disobedience Tactics
teaser: Across the country, people are staging "die ins" to bring attention to the number of black men killed by police recently. In Milwaukee, protesters are being trained incivil disobedience tactics. Dozens of people have been protesting for months there after a white police officer fired 14 shots and killed a mentally ill, unarmed African American man last  April.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
